name: Clutching at Straws
description:
You are falling through the air.

Try to take things and save your self.

Control the character with the arrow keys.
Combine items with the mouse.
Drop items on the character with the mouse to activate them.

Music by Aron Stefansson

Source code: https://github.com/tradfursten/spelsylt6_clutching_at_straws
